#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    short int T;
    cin>>T;
    while(T)
    {
        char a[51];
        cin>>a;
        int sum = 0;
        short int l = strlen(a);
        for(int i = 0; i < l ; i ++ )
        {
            sum += (a[i] - 'A' + 1);
        }
        cout<<sum<<"\n";      
        T--;
    }
    return 0;
}
